languages.text: {n}Темные глаза загораются живым интересом.{/n} "Воистину дела вы вести умеете, шерин! Требуете платы, еще не давши ответа, разумев мое неустойчивое положение... Уважаю. И уж не знаю, алкоголь говорит во мне или предчувствие какое, да только хочется мне с вами пойти на риск".

traits.locale_text: {n}Темные глаза загораются живым интересом.{/n} "Воистину дела вы вести умеете, шерин! Требуете платы, еще не давши ответа, разумев мое неустойчивое положение... Уважаю. И уж не знаю, алкоголь говорит во мне или предчувствие какое, да только хочется мне с вами пойти на риск".

languages.text: {n}Her dark eyes light up with keen interest.{/n} "You truly know how to do business, shereen! You demand payment before giving an answer because you're aware of the weakness of my position... I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."
languages.original_text: {n}Темные глаза загораются живым интересом.{/n} "Воистину дела вы вести умеете, шерин! Требуете платы, еще не давши ответа, разумев мое неустойчивое положение... Уважаю. И уж не знаю, алкоголь говорит во мне или предчувствие какое, да только хочется мне с вами пойти на риск".

You demand payment before giving an answer because you're aware of the weakness of my position... I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

{n}Her dark eyes light up with keen interest.{/n} "You truly know how to do business, shereen! You demand payment before giving an answer because you're aware of the weakness of my position... I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

languages.text: {n}她的黑眼睛亮了起来，充满了兴趣。{/n}“你真是个懂得做生意的人，亲爱的！你还没有给出你的答复，就要求我付款，因为你清楚我没有立场和你讨价还价……我很佩服你这一点。我不知道我是喝得有点多了，还是直觉让我这么做，但我愿意在你身上赌一把。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her dark eyes light up with keen interest.{/n} "You truly know how to do business, shereen! You demand payment before giving an answer because you're aware of the weakness of my position... I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的黑眼睛亮了起来，充满了兴趣。{/n}“你真是个懂得做生意的人，亲爱的！你还没有给出你的答复，就要求我付款，因为你清楚我没有立场和你讨价还价……我很佩服你这一点。我不知道我是喝得有点多了，还是直觉让我这么做，但我愿意在你身上赌一把。”

languages.text: {n}Sus ojos oscuros se iluminan con interés.{/n} «¡Sabe perfectamente cómo funcionan los negocios, shereen! Exige el pago antes de darme una respuesta porque es consciente de la debilidad de mi posición... eso lo respeto. Y no sé si será cosa del alcohol o una sensación propiamente mía, pero quiero afrontar ese riesgo con usted».
languages.original_text: {n}Her dark eyes light up with keen interest.{/n} "You truly know how to do business, shereen! You demand payment before giving an answer because you're aware of the weakness of my position... I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus ojos oscuros se iluminan con interés.{/n} «¡Sabe perfectamente cómo funcionan los negocios, shereen! Exige el pago antes de darme una respuesta porque es consciente de la debilidad de mi posición... eso lo respeto. Y no sé si será cosa del alcohol o una sensación propiamente mía, pero quiero afrontar ese riesgo con usted».

languages.text: {n}強く興味を持ったジェイの黒い瞳がキラリと光る。{/n}「アンタはビジネスのやり方をよく分かってるね、シャリーン！答えを出す前に支払いを求めるってことは、あたしの立場が弱いことに気づいてるんだろう…尊敬するよ。酒が入っちまってるからかただの勘なのかは分からないけど、アンタと手を組むリスクをとりたいもんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Her dark eyes light up with keen interest.{/n} "You truly know how to do business, shereen! You demand payment before giving an answer because you're aware of the weakness of my position... I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}強く興味を持ったジェイの黒い瞳がキラリと光る。{/n}「アンタはビジネスのやり方をよく分かってるね、シャリーン！答えを出す前に支払いを求めるってことは、あたしの立場が弱いことに気づいてるんだろう…尊敬するよ。酒が入っちまってるからかただの勘なのかは分からないけど、アンタと手を組むリスクをとりたいもんだ」

languages.text: {n}Un vif intérêt embrase son regard noir.{/n} « Vous savez vous y prendre en affaires, shereen ! Vous exigez un paiement avant de donner une réponse parce que vous savez que je suis en position de faiblesse... C'est quelque chose que je respecte. Et je ne sais pas si c'est l'alcool qui me fait dire ça ou juste mon instinct, mais je suis prête à prendre ce risque avec vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her dark eyes light up with keen interest.{/n} "You truly know how to do business, shereen! You demand payment before giving an answer because you're aware of the weakness of my position... I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un vif intérêt embrase son regard noir.{/n} « Vous savez vous y prendre en affaires, shereen ! Vous exigez un paiement avant de donner une réponse parce que vous savez que je suis en position de faiblesse... C'est quelque chose que je respecte. Et je ne sais pas si c'est l'alcool qui me fait dire ça ou juste mon instinct, mais je suis prête à prendre ce risque avec vous. »

languages.text: {n}In ihren dunklen Augen blitzt aufrichtiges Interesse auf.{/n} "Ihr wisst wirklich, wie man Geschäfte macht, Shereen! Ihr verlangt eine Bezahlung, bevor Ihr antwortet, weil Ihr um die Schwäche meiner Position wisst ... Das respektiere ich. Und ich weiß nicht, ob der Alkohol aus mir spricht oder ich nur so ein Gefühl habe, aber ich möchte dieses Risiko mit Euch eingehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Her dark eyes light up with keen interest.{/n} "You truly know how to do business, shereen! You demand payment before giving an answer because you're aware of the weakness of my position... I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

Ihr verlangt eine Bezahlung, bevor Ihr antwortet, weil Ihr um die Schwäche meiner Position wisst ... Das respektiere ich. Und ich weiß nicht, ob der Alkohol aus mir spricht oder ich nur so ein Gefühl habe, aber ich möchte dieses Risiko mit Euch eingehen."

languages.original_text: {n}Her dark eyes light up with keen interest.{/n} "You truly know how to do business, shereen! You demand payment before giving an answer because you're aware of the weakness of my position... I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

languages.text: {n}Kara gözleri, hevesli bir ilgiyle parlıyor.{/n} "Bu işlerden sahiden de iyi anlıyormuşsun şirinim! Elimin zayıf olduğunu bildiğin için cevap vermeden önce ödeme talep ediyorsun. Saygı duydum. Alkolden kafam mı güzelleşti yoksa içimden bir ses mi öyle diyor bilmiyorum ama seninle bu riske varım."
languages.original_text: {n}Her dark eyes light up with keen interest.{/n} "You truly know how to do business, shereen! You demand payment before giving an answer because you're aware of the weakness of my position... I respect that. And I don't know if it's the alcohol talking or just a feeling I have, but I want to take that risk with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Büyük bir merakla, koyu renkli gözleri parlıyor.{/n} "Bu işlerden çok iyi anlıyormuşsun şirinim! Elimin ne kadar zayıf olduğunu bildiğin için cevap vermeden ödeme talep ediyorsun... Buna saygı duyarım. Acaba alkol yüzünden mi, yoksa içimden bir his mi öyle diyor bilmiyorum ama seninle bu riske varım."
